posts.post_content:
Too powerful card imo because of cascade and haste combined for 4 CMC, but it seems that when something has the word "elf" on it, it just has to be overpowered.
  
The art is just horrible! An elf that rushes into combat while bringing something else with it is NOT captured in this art that mostly looks like a grumpy elf with bad hair and an eating disorder, waiting in line, just standing there.

Posted By: InsanePirate (7/8/2010 2:53:25 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
So it is THIS card that incriminated Alara in the whole "power creep" scandal.........  
  
THIS card is not Alara.  
  
I've been playing awhile; I play blue; I played Esper.  
  
I didn't notice a thing in terms of power level of cards.  
  
  
Out of the cascade cards, this is the only one that REALLY mattered. So it wasn't the cascade mechanic that upped the stakes.  
  
Bloodbraid Elf started the recent power creep. Not cascade. Not Shards of Alara block.
posts.html:
